left-content.heading: Set-up Catalix for Success
left-content.paragraph: Get Catalix up to date or start your transformation by following the guide below.

right-content.heading: Get ready to transform
right-content.paragraph: Here’s a video to get started. As your transformation progresses, you’ll get fresh tips and insights here.

slides.text: Assess your current development processes and workflows
Build your development value stream map
Identify bottlenecks and areas for improvement in the value stream
Implement strategies to streamline and optimize the value stream
Continuously monitor and refine your value stream map to adapt to changing needs and circumstances
Measure the effectiveness of your improvements and iterate as necessary to enhance efficiency and productivity
